interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Grinding Away Skin Polishing Scrub, 3 fl. oz., Polishing Scrub Works to Improve Skin's Texture and Tone by Buffing Away Dead Skin Cells by Higher Education Skincare
Review Date: 2020/10/11
Store: Higher Education
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoother', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free, Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 3.58 x 1.61 inches; 3 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381031008'}
Review Text: Although the Higher Education facial scrub has a bit of a chemical induced rather than fragrant smell, its texture and cleansing power is great at getting rid of dead skin cells and dull patches. My skin feels refreshed and truly soft after using, without need to resort to facial cloths to do the scrubbing. A double pea size amount goes a long way for scrubbing face and neck, so amount will last a long while. 4/5.
Review Title: Pleased with scrubbing properties, smells a little chemically
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Makeup Blender Sponge Set - 4 Pack Latex Free Q-Soft Makeup Beauty Foundation Blending Sponge Flawless Smooth Brush for Liquid Foundation BB Creams Powders Concealer (4 Pack)
FRESHME
{'Brand': 'FRESHME', 'Color': 'Ivory', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.6 x 3.6 x 1.4 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '681413196902', 'Manufacturer': 'FRESHME'}
I like the size and shape of these sponges, specially for application of foundation. I use liquid foundation and I noticed that the sponge was soaking up the makeup. I started using these only to apply powdered makeup like rouge or shimmer and they work very well.
good for powder but not liquid makeup
Manicure and Pedicure Nail Clipper from POWERGROOMING - Powerful Trimmer for Thick and Thin Finger Nails and Toe Nails - Included Nail File and"Catcher" for Easy Cleanup (1 Pack)
POWERGROOMING
{'Brand': 'POWERGROOMING', 'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Blade Edge': 'Straight', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Target Audience': 'Women, Men', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 1.3 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '653233212735', 'Manufacturer': 'POWERGROOMING'}
This has been one of my favorite nail clippers I have used. It cuts with precision, even toenails that are thick or semi ingrown. curvature of clip is wide so it will not clip nails leaving edges, and you do not have to use more than once per nail except toe nail. I also like the little case that does with it and the curved body gives thumb more leverage to hold in place when clipping. It comes with a nail filer but I didn't find much use for it.
Strong clipping power, case is great for traveling
Grinding Away Skin Polishing Scrub, 3 fl. oz., Polishing Scrub Works to Improve Skin's Texture and Tone by Buffing Away Dead Skin Cells by Higher Education Skincare
Higher Education
{'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoother', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free, Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 3.58 x 1.61 inches; 3 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381031008'}
Although the Higher Education facial scrub has a bit of a chemical induced rather than fragrant smell, its texture and cleansing power is great at getting rid of dead skin cells and dull patches. My skin feels refreshed and truly soft after using, without need to resort to facial cloths to do the scrubbing. A double pea size amount goes a long way for scrubbing face and neck, so amount will last a long while. 4/5.
Pleased with scrubbing properties, smells a little chemically
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Makeup Preferences:**
  - Prefers products for powdered makeup application, facing challenges with liquid makeup, especially regarding absorption by tools.

- **Product Characteristics:**
  - Values ergonomic designs in makeup applicators and grooming tools, enhancing usability and control.
  - Chooses latex-free materials, indicating a sensitivity or preference for hypoallergenic options.

- **Performance Expectations:**
  - Expects makeup tools to minimize excessive product absorption and looks for multifunctional products suited for various makeup types.
  - Recently engaged with skincare products that improve skin texture and tone, reflecting an interest in effective personal grooming solutions. 

- **Brand Engagement:**
  - Engages with specific brands, showing loyalty and preference within certain product ranges.

- **Personal Grooming Preferences:**
  - Demonstrates a keen interest in well-designed grooming tools beyond makeup, emphasizing efficiency and precision, as evident in positive experiences with high-quality grooming products.
  - Appreciates practical features, such as ergonomic design in skincare and grooming tools for better control and convenience.

Overall, the user maintains a thoughtful approach to both makeup and personal grooming, focusing on practicality, performance, and effective application of tools, with a preference for products that cater to specific needs and enhance usability. The recent engagement with skincare indicates a holistic approach to personal care.
